The boy turns around and is confused to see you gone, but soon spits you on his plate. “Silly toy.” The boy giggles as he picks you up. “Dis my fwood.” He says as he suddenly licks you. “Yummy! You taste good.” He says as he licks you again. He grins at you and drops you back on his plate. Before you can register what just happened, his spoon comes towards you and swirled you with the Mac and cheese and Apple sauce together. You are now in a sticky pile of food as he licks his lips. “New game!” He giggled. “ I tries to eat you, but you run. If no more food you win. If i catches you I eats you.”

You can’t believe what this kid said. He was going to eat you! “You can’t eat me! I’m a human like you! Please don’t do this! I’ll be your toy!!” You yelled to him as he scooped up a pile with his spoon. You watched as he chewed with his mouth open and saw the bulge go down his throat as he swallowed. You barely slipped out of the way of his next spoon full. Getting up you fell over and saw your leg trapped in the hole of a macaroni noodle. You tugged as hard as you could frantically as you you saw the spoon coming you way. At the last moment you foot popped free and and you turn to run. You get a few steps before you hit a tan wall and end up covered by the spoon full of Food mixture. You sputter as you dig your head free and notice your in a cracker covered in the mixture. It gets dark as he drops another cracker on top and sandwiches you between them.

You attempted to move but you wedged tight. You feel your self slide as he bites down and you end up slipping from the cracker sandwich And you end up....

1441221.content:
You feel yourself slip free of the crackers when he bites down, but you panic as you fall though the air. You close your eyes and prepare for a hard landing, but you end up splashing into a liquid. You surface sputtering and wiping your face frantically. The liquid is thick and sweet. Once you open your eyes you panic as you realize you had fallen into the peach cup and the liquid you are swimming in is the syrup.

Looking up you see the bulge in Trenton’s throat as he finished off the crackers and looked around for you. Ducking behind a peach piece you try wishing he didn’t see you, but you hope is shattered as he lifts up the cup you are in and started at you while licking his lips. “I win.” Is all he says as he tilts the cup in his mouth and you flow out into his mouth with the peaches and juice. He closes his mouth and you are tossed around as he begins to chew and play with the peaches. His tongue pushes you into the peaches and squished them before rolling you around as he chews. After a while he pinned you to the roof of his mouth as he swallowed and allowed you to fall back onto his tongue. Light blinds you as he opens his mouth and...
1441221.title: Swimming in the peach cup

choices: He gets sick and throws you up
14412211.content:
You’re relieved when he opens his mouth and think he’s going to take you out of his mouth. Just as fast your hopes are dashed as he says “Hope you can swim.” A cup of juice appeared out side his mouth and a wave rushed towards you. “No! Please don’t swallow me!” You scream as the wave knocked into you and sent you over the edge of his tongue. With a loud “Gulp!” You where swallowed and only a tiny wiggling bulge could be seen going down his throat.

The muscles squeezed and pulled at you as the slimy surface prevents any hold to stop your fall. Another Gish of liquid hits you from above just be fore you plummet into a wide chamber. You splash into the stomach juices that are not yet digestive level yet. The smell alone makes you gag then dry heave as you feel around for a wall. You start banging to be let out and the boy only giggles and causes a turbulent water hazard. Surfacing you feel tge liquidate bubble under you and you skin starts to tingle.
14412211.title: Swallows you down with his drink.
